timeline.activity: Patient experienced high grade fever, chills, cold, and productive cough
timeline.symptom: high grade fever, chills, cold, productive cough

timeline.activity: Patient was examined in a well lit room after taking consent

notes.physical_exam: Patient is conscious, coherent and cooperative. Pallor - absent, icterus - absent, Cyanosis - absent, Clubbing - absent, No lymphadenopathy, No pedal edema.
notes.lab_measurements: Temperature: 98.2F, BP: 130/90 mmHg, PR: 98bpm, RR: 22 cpm, SpO2: 98% in room air

notes.discussion: CVS: S1 S2 heard, no thrills and murmurs, RS: trachea central, BAE- present, Normal vesicular Breath sounds, CNS: No focal neurological deficits, P/A: soft, non tender, Umbilicus - inverted, All quadrants moving equally with respiration, Scars- No scars seen, No palpable spleen and liver, Normal bowel sounds heard

notes.investigations: CBP, CUE, LFT, RFT, Rapid HBSg, HIV 1 and 2, HCV, ECG
notes.lab_measurements: HB: 12.8 gm/dl, Total count: 5000 cells/cumm, Platelet count: 2.07 lakh/cumm, Albumin: trace, Pus cells: 4, Sugar: nil, Epithelial cells: 2-3, T.Bilirubin: 0.53, D.bilirubin: 0.20, SGOT: 69, SGPT: 78, Alkaline phosphatase: 177, T.proteins: 6.6, Albumin: 3.2, A/g: 0.95, S.creatinine: 0.8, S.urea: 12, S.electrolytes: Sodium: 139, Potassium: 3.7, Chloride: 98

timeline.treatment: IVF NS, RL @ 100 Ml/hr, Inj.pan 40mg /iv/od, INJ.optineuron 1 amp in 100 ml NS/iv/od, Tab.Dolo 650 mg po/sos, temperature monitoring 4th hourly, strict bp, pr monitoring 4th hourly
